{"id":545270512,"lang":"java","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1630094400,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"39 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/545270512/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Characters to Make Fancy String","memory":"84.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String makeFancyString(String s) {\n        if (s.length() <= 2) return s;\n        \n        char one = s.charAt(0);\n        char two = s.charAt(1);\n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        sb.append(one).append(two);\n        \n        for (int i = 2; i < s.length(); i++) {\n            if (one == two && two == s.charAt(i))\n                continue;\n            else {\n                one = two;\n                two = s.charAt(i);\n                sb.append(two);\n            }   \n        }\n        return sb.toString();\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-characters-to-make-fancy-string"}
